WotD37 - Parabola

Sep 1, 2015

Well Wayne saved me a job - he drew a beautiful parabola...

Maths is beautiful.

The #PositivePostIts word of the day was #Parabola #Mathematics #Maths #Quote #Beauty #Trust. You can read the blog here http://helenwalker.net/2015/09/01/wotd37-parabola/

A photo posted by Helen Walker (@h313n1w) on Sep 2, 2015 at 1:11am PDT </div> </blockquote>

Understanding the language of mathematics is more than just numbers, although there is a joy to the fundaments of arithmatic, nowhere is this more obvious than in the space between algebra and geometry.

It seems that telling stories about mathematicians and scientists is very cool at the moment, with recent films about Hawkings and Turing amongst the most notable, but I am excited about this one...

https://youtu.be/kLEyxQv3l0U

C'mon people - get your maths on...
